questions.question: What happens when two north poles of magnets are placed near one another?

choices.answer: Earth is a giant magnet, but the bar magnet is closer.
The magnet made Earth’s magnetic field change direction.
The compass’s needle only works when it is outside.
Earth is bigger than the magnet, so it has more gravity.

questions.question: In order for an electromagnet to work, what must be true?

choices.answer: They can move iron objects without touching them.
They can give a “shock” when you touch them.
They are always black and cold to touch.

choices.answer: A natural magnet

Try adding 2, 3, 4, then 5 batteries
Try changing to a different kind of wire.
